name: part_004
file: tmp_【#博衣こより3D】歌います！踊ります！体を張ります！アイドルです！！！【ホロライブ】 [yOZxZy1HcJg]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_004.mov

scenes.description: Hakui Koyori is on stage, preparing to introduce her guests.
Guests Sakura Miko, Houshou Marine, and Shirogane Noel appear on stage.
The guests tease Koyori about pushing boundaries in her 3D debut.
Marine comments on Koyori's short shirt, leading to the guests pressuring her to remove her lab coat.
Koyori removes her lab coat, and the guests focus on her armpits and trying to see under her shirt.
Koyori performs a bridge pose at the guests' request.
The guests shift their focus to Koyori's lower body, specifically her stockings and high heels.

subtitles.original: それでは、

subtitles.english: I'd like to call out everyone with pinkish heads!

subtitles.original: 頭ピンクっぽい皆さんー！

subtitles.original: 船長まりんです！
subtitles.english: Captain Marine!

subtitles.original: はい！こんまっするー！えー、ちょっと髪の毛もうピンクを通り越して、

subtitles.english: and become pure white, or rather, silver. Yes.

subtitles.original: ま、中身はね、でも誰よりもピンクだと噂されているノエルです。

subtitles.original: よろしくお願いします。

subtitles.original: 今日はもう、こよりのアイドル人生終わらせに来たから。
subtitles.english: Today, we've come to end Koyori's idol career.

subtitles.original: あ、そ、そうですか？洗濯で縮んだ感じかな？
